sent.orig: Two-component puzzle glue has good weather resistance, heat resistance, water resistance, solvent resistance and grease resistance.
sent.trans: 双组分拼板胶具有良好的耐候性，耐热性，耐水性，耐溶剂性和耐油脂性。

sent.orig: Evaporation. Excellent adhesion. Excellent rub and scratch Resistance. Excellent weather resistance. Chemical resistance. Steam resistance.
sent.trans: 自然干，良好附着力，良好抗刮伤能力，耐候，耐化学物质，耐蒸煮。

sent.orig: This paper describes the hot insulation resistance and cold insulation resistance minimum value of resistance.
sent.trans: 文章叙及对绕组热态绝缘电阻、冷态绝缘电阻的理解。

sent.orig: Coated with epoxy resin for superior heat resistance, humidity resistance and solvent resistance.
sent.trans: 环氧树脂包封，表面光洁，且有良好的耐湿热性、耐溶性能。

sent.orig: Testing results showed that the coat was excellent in abrasion resistance, stain resistance and slip resistance.
sent.trans: 结果表明涂层在耐磨、耐污和防滑性方面表现优异。
